name: Stones (Liéna EULOGE)
description:
Stones is game - level editor R&D project made by three programmers and two game artists, in about 2-3 weeks with UnrealEngine.

It has been inspired by Wonderbox : The Adventure Maker and Townscapers.

Feels free to create your dream house and play with the clock to previsualize your build at any time of the day !

Credits : 

Damien JOUBERT - Game Artist

Jade BARBIER  - Game Artist

Johan MENARD - Programmer

Pierre PÉTILLAT - Programmer

Liéna EULOGE - Programmer
